T11dhkpvsvu:2341: 06527 tadātmano api sāmānyasya tad-ekayogakṣematvāt / tad ayam
T11dhkpvsvu:2343: 06601 ādir na ca vastv-ātmana ekasya tatra eva vṛttir
T11dhkpvsvu:2346: 06603 syāt / sāmānyasya vṛttir na viśeṣasya iti cet / na /
T11dhkpvsvu:2348: 06604 hi eka-rūpaṃ sāmānyaṃ vā bhavet viśeṣo vā /
T11dhkpvsvu:2350: 06605 ayaṃ pravibhāgo yuktaḥ sati vā avyatireko na syād ity uktam /
T11dhkpvsvu:2351: 06606 tad ayam avibhāgo anviyād vā na vā /
T11dhkpvsvu:2353: 06607 ca / yo api bhinnam eva sāmānyam āha / tasya api /
T11dhkpvsvu:2355: 06609 yathāsvaṃ śabdā bhinnam artham abhidadhānāḥ katham eka-artha-
T11dhkpvsvu:2359: 06612 sarvatra bhāvād vyāvṛtter na ete doṣāḥ prasaṅginaḥ //136//
T11dhkpvsvu:2360: 06613 yathā hy ekas tasmād bhinnas tathā anyo api iti bhedasya asāmānya-
T11dhkpvsvu:2362: pariśiṣṭa-abhāvas tu prāg eva uktaḥ / api ca /
T11dhkpvsvu:2367: 06619 yad rūpaṃ śābaleyasya bāhuleyasya na asti tat /
T11dhkpvsvu:2369: 06621 artha-abhedena ca vinā śabda-abhedo na yujyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:2370: 06622 tasmāt tat-kāryatā api iṣṭā atat-kāryād eva bhinnatā //140//
T11dhkpvsvu:2375: 06701 yo api manyate katham abhinnam artham antareṇa bahuṣv ekā
T11dhkpvsvu:2376: 06702 śrutiḥ teṣām asāmyāt eka-vṛtter anyatra pratyaya-ajananāt
T11dhkpvsvu:2377: 06703 apratyāsattike ca pratyaya-utpāde atiprasaṅgāt teṣu ca eka-
T11dhkpvsvu:2380: 06706 iti / tasya apy ekam asti ity eva lokena śabdo niveśanīyaḥ tad
T11dhkpvsvu:2381: 06707 vā ekam enāṃ śrutiṃ vastu-śaktyā eva dhvanayati iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:2383: 06708 kiṃ tarhi kenacit prayojanena kecic śabdāḥ kvacin niveśyante /
T11dhkpvsvu:2384: 06709 tatra yady anekam ekatra upayujyeta tad avaśyaṃ tatra codanīyaṃ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2385: 06710 tasya pṛthak pṛthak codane atigauravaṃ syāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:2390: kevalam anena tatra yogyās te arthāś codanīyāḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2391: 06713 ta ekena vā śabdena codyeran bahubhir vā iti svātantryam
T11dhkpvsvu:2393: tad iyam ekā śrutir bahuṣu vaktṛ-abhiprāya-
T11dhkpvsvu:2398: yadi hi na prayoktur icchā katham
T11dhkpvsvu:2400: icchāyāṃ vā ka enāṃ bahuṣv api
T11dhkpvsvu:2409: 06722 śabdo bhinneṣu bhaved ity uktaṃ prāk /
T11dhkpvsvu:2411: 06723 tu bhinnānām aviruddhā iti sa eva artha-abhedaḥ śabda-abhedasya
T11dhkpvsvu:2415: na punar eṣām anyā tat-kāryatā anyatra anyato
T11dhkpvsvu:2418: 06802 sambhave kuto rūpa-vijñānam iti vyavahāra-lāghava-arthaṃ kaścit
T11dhkpvsvu:2419: 06803 sāṃketikīṃ śrutiṃ niveśayet yaro rūpa-vijñāna-hetuḥ śaso
T11dhkpvsvu:2420: 06804 vā iti / api nāma sarveṣāṃ tad-hetūnāṃ sakṛt pratītir yathā syād
T11dhkpvsvu:2421: 06805 iti / na ca atra anugāmi kiṃcid rūpam asti /
T11dhkpvsvu:2423: 06806 te bhāvā atad-arthebhyo bhinnā iti bheda eva eṣām abhedaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2426: 06808 kiṃcid ekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ tatra viśeṣa-abhāvād apārthikā
T11dhkpvsvu:2427: 06809 viśeṣa-codanā iti sakṛt sarveṣāṃ niyojana-artham ekam ayaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:2428: 06810 lokaḥ śabdaṃ teṣu niyuṅkte ghaṭa iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:2437: na punar atra anyat kiṃcid yathā-varṇita-lakṣaṇaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:2441: 06819 ye hetu-phala-viśeṣa-bhūtāḥ kiṃcid ekaṃ sādhayanti sādhyante
T11dhkpvsvu:2442: 06820 vā te api sakṛt pratyaya-arthaṃ vrīhy-ādi-śabdaiḥ kṛta-saṃketāḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:2444: ye api pṛthak samastā vā kvacid
T11dhkpvsvu:2445: 06822 upayujyante ta avasthā-viśeṣa-vācibhiḥ sakṛd eva śabdaiḥ pratyaya-
T11dhkpvsvu:2446: 06823 arthaṃ khyāpyante sanidarśanāḥ sapratighā vā iti tad-anyebhyo
T11dhkpvsvu:2453: 06902 bāhuleyaḥ prayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtako vā iti / tathā
T11dhkpvsvu:2454: 06903 tat-kārya-pratiṣedhena apy acākṣuṣaḥ śabdo anityo anātma iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:2459: 06906 ākāraṃ buddhāv āropya tad-vyavacchedena vyapadeśaḥ kriyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:2463: 06910 eka-vṛtter aneko api yady eka-śrutimān bhavet /
T11dhkpvsvu:2464: 06911 na kevalam eka-kāryās tad-anya-bheda-aviśeṣād eka-śabdena ucyante
T11dhkpvsvu:2465: 06912 api tv eka-vṛttyā apy aneka eka-śabdena ucyeta /
T11dhkpvsvu:2467: 06913 uktam atra / tasya upalabhya-abhimatasya anupalabdher abhāvāt
T11dhkpvsvu:2469: 06915 ādayo na bhaveyur ity ādi / api ca /
T11dhkpvsvu:2470: 06916 vṛttir ādheyatā vyaktir iti tasmin na yujyate //143//
T11dhkpvsvu:2471: 06917 yad etad ekam anekatra vartamānam ekāṃ śrutiṃ vartayati
T11dhkpvsvu:2484: tasya tatra samavāyād ādhāra iti cet ko
T11dhkpvsvu:2487: 07002 tad eva idam anupakārakasya āśrayatvaṃ na sambhāvayāmaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2490: 07004 ādayo api vastu-sambandhāḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvān na vyatiricyante /
T11dhkpvsvu:2503: 07011 svātmany anupakurvāṇo anapekṣasya ādhāra iti yācitaka-maṇḍanam
T11dhkpvsvu:2504: 07012 etat / kathaṃ tarhi idānīm ajanakaṃ kuṇḍaṃ badarāṇām
T11dhkpvsvu:2508: 07016 prakṛtyā eva guruṇo dravyasya asamāna-deśa-kārya-utpādana dharmaṇaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:2511: 07018 kṣaṇa-sahakāri kuṇḍaṃ tatra eva badara-kāryaṃ janayad ādhāra
T11dhkpvsvu:2512: 07019 ity ucyate / anyathā iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi ity api na syāt / na vai
T11dhkpvsvu:2516: 07021 kiṃ punaḥ sa tayor eva saṃyogaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2518: 07022 vā / sa kim ekatra eva na samavaiti janyate vā /
T11dhkpvsvu:2520: 07023 tad asamarthaṃ pṛthak tat sahitam api tādṛśam eva ity anupakārakatvān
T11dhkpvsvu:2530: 07103 sambandhā janakasya eva upayoga-viśeṣa-vaśāt pravibhāgena kāryakāraṇabhāvād
T11dhkpvsvu:2535: 07107 na hy ayaṃ janana-viśeṣa-lakṣaṇa ādhāra-bhāvaḥ sāmānye sāmānya-
T11dhkpvsvu:2540: 07111 atha api syāt sthāpaka āśrayaḥ sāmānyasya tataḥ sthiti-hetutvād
T11dhkpvsvu:2544: 07113 patana-dharmāṇāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ pāta-pratibandhād ajanako api
T11dhkpvsvu:2546: atra api yadi kaścit pratibandhaṃ na paryanuyuñjīta /
T11dhkpvsvu:2547: 07115 sa hi pāta-pratibandho na artha-antaram eva yaḥ sthāpayitrā
T11dhkpvsvu:2548: 07116 kriyeta / artha-antaratve tatra eva asya upayoga iti kaḥ patataḥ pratibandhaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2549: 07117 pratibandhād apāte api tulyaḥ paryanuyogo anavasthā
T11dhkpvsvu:2550: 07118 vā / tasmāt pāta-abhāvaḥ pāta-pratibandhaḥ sa kathaṃ kenacit
T11dhkpvsvu:2551: 07119 kriyate / abhāvaṃ karoti iti hi na abhāvo nāma kaścit kāryaḥ / tasya
T11dhkpvsvu:2554: 07121 nirdeśa eṣa bhāvaṃ na karoti iti yāvat /
T11dhkpvsvu:2556: 07122 kiṃcit karoti ity akiṃcitkaraś ca kaḥ kasya sthāpako nāma / tena
T11dhkpvsvu:2557: 07123 ayaṃ kenacid apratibaddha iti na kadācit tiṣṭhet /
T11dhkpvsvu:2559: 07124 pratibandha ity api kṣaṇikānāṃ bhāvānām upādāna-samāna-
T11dhkpvsvu:2562: 07126 tat-karaṇād gatimato dravyasya kaścit sthāpako apy astu /
T11dhkpvsvu:2563: 07127 sāmānyasya akriyasya kiṃ-lakṣaṇāṃ sthitiṃ kurvāṇaḥ sthāpakaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:2564: 07128 syāt / sthitir hi tasya svarūpa-apracyutir eva /
T11dhkpvsvu:2571: sā anyā cet tām eva sa āśrayaḥ karoti / sā
T11dhkpvsvu:2572: 07203 ca apratibaddhā sāmānya iti kim sāmānyasya āśrayeṇa /
T11dhkpvsvu:2579: jananaṃ cet kim āśrayeṇa apekṣitena anupakāriṇā /
T11dhkpvsvu:2580: 07207 apekṣā iti hi tat-pratibandhaḥ sa ca anādheyaviśeṣasya sāmānyasya
T11dhkpvsvu:2583: 07209 abhede vā sthiteḥ sāmānyāt svarūpam eva tat tasya / tac ca
T11dhkpvsvu:2590: 07212 sāmānyasya avyaktasya vyaktyā jñāna-kāraṇatvāt tad-vyaktis tatra
T11dhkpvsvu:2594: 07215 tad vyaṅgyaṃ yogyatāyāś ca kāraṇam kārakaṃ matam //146//
T11dhkpvsvu:2595: 07217 prāg eva asya ca yogyatve tad-apekṣā na yujyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:2597: 07219 na khalu vai kārakād vyañjakasya kaścid bhedaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2600: 07221 vā janayan bhāvam eva vyañjaka ucyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:2602: 07222 janana-śaktir anākṣiptā janyasya iti janana-mātreṇa kārakatvam /
T11dhkpvsvu:2603: 07223 yo hi yato vijñāna-utpādana-yogyatāṃ pratilabhate sa cen
T11dhkpvsvu:2605: sā asya svabhāva-bhūtā yogyatā prāg eva asti
T11dhkpvsvu:2608: 07226 sa eva tato bhavati iti sthiti-vat prasaṅgaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2610: 07227 taṃ karoti na apy anyam ity akiṃcitkaraś ca apekṣyata iti vyāhatam
T11dhkpvsvu:2611: 07301 etat / nanv ajanakā api kāryatvād dhūma-ādayo vyañjakāḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2612: 07302 satyaṃ vyañjakā na tu dhūmam apekṣya agnir ātmani jñānaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:2613: 07303 janayati / tathābhūtasya agneḥ sākṣād ajanakatvāt / kevalam
T11dhkpvsvu:2614: 07304 upādāna-balena eva tatra jñānam utpadyate na viṣaya-balena asaty
T11dhkpvsvu:2618: 07307 balena utpattir vā iti niveditam etat /
T11dhkpvsvu:2620: 07308 viṣayāḥ sākṣād upayogena vijñānaṃ janayantas tatra param
T11dhkpvsvu:2621: 07309 apekṣante te avaśyaṃ tata ātmānaṃ pratilabhante / na ca ayam
T11dhkpvsvu:2628: 07313 svāśraya-samavetaṃ hi tad ātmany anyatra vā vijñāna-hetur iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:2629: 07314 uktam atra ajanya-janakayoḥ ko ayam āśrayāśrayibhāva-lakṣaṇaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:2632: 07316 eva syāt / tad-hetoḥ svabhāvasya prāg-abhāvāt paścāc ca tato
T11dhkpvsvu:2633: 07317 bhāvāt / nityaṃ tat-svabhāva-sadbhāve prāg api samavāyād vijñāna-
T11dhkpvsvu:2638: 07320 añjana-āder iva vyakteḥ saṃskāro na indriyasya ca /
T11dhkpvsvu:2640: 07322 saṃskṛtam añjana-ādibhir indriyaṃ pratipattau kiṃcid atiśayam
T11dhkpvsvu:2643: 07324 na evaṃ vyakter indriyasya kaścit saṃskāras tad-bhāva-abhāva-
T11dhkpvsvu:2648: 07403 prāg adṛśye darśana-śakty-ādhānād upakāraka iti cet /
T11dhkpvsvu:2650: 07404 arthaṃ darśayan kathaṃ na pratipatter bhedakaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2654: 07406 saṃskārāt tad-darśane tad-vyaṅgyeṣu sāmānyeṣu kadācit aniścayo
T11dhkpvsvu:2657: 07408 vyakter yadi indriya-saṃskāro yadi na indriya-saṃskāraḥ sāmānyasya
T11dhkpvsvu:2658: 07409 vijñāna-janana-svabhāva iti svabhāvād apracyuter anapekṣya eva
T11dhkpvsvu:2666: yo hy eṣāṃ janaka ātmā sa tadā eva tato bhavati
T11dhkpvsvu:2667: 07414 iti janyatā eva eṣāṃ parasparato apekṣā /
T11dhkpvsvu:2669: 07415 paraṃ nityaṃ tat-svabhāvaṃ kim iti indriyam apekṣate /
T11dhkpvsvu:2670: 07416 hi tasya kevalasya yo na tat-svabhāvaḥ sa punaḥ kathaṃcid
T11dhkpvsvu:2673: 07418 hetur ity api pāraṃparyeṇa vyakteḥ kāryam eva sāmānyam
T11dhkpvsvu:2675: 07420 vyañjakasya ca jātīnāṃ jātimattā yadi iṣyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:2677: 07422 yo hi yad-viṣaya-vijñāna-hetuḥ sa tasya vyañjakaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2683: 07501 syuḥ / na hi vyakter api jñāna-hetutāṃ muktvā anyā kācid asty
T11dhkpvsvu:2688: 07504 iti / samavāya-mātraṃ hi vyaktyā saha asya jātaṃ na anyaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:2690: pūrvavat paścād api na jñāna-hetuḥ syāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:2691: 07506 samavāyād eva jñāna-hetutve svāśraya-samavāyinām anyeṣām api
T11dhkpvsvu:2693: tasmāj jñāna-hetutā eva vyañjakatvaṃ / tac ca
T11dhkpvsvu:2694: 07508 tulyaṃ pradīpa-ādāv iti sa eva prasaṅgaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2697: avṛtter na anekatra jñāna-hetuḥ / ata eva /
T11dhkpvsvu:2698: 07510 vyakter anyā athavā ananyā yeṣāṃ jātis tu vidyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:2708: 07517 sā hi buddhir eka-bhāvinī vyakty-antaram evam āskanded bhūta-
T11dhkpvsvu:2709: 07518 grāhiṇī yadi tatra dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃcid anyatra paśyet / tac ca
T11dhkpvsvu:2713: svabhāvo hi svabhāvān na tattvam anyatvaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:2716: 07523 eva khalu rūpasya anyatvaṃ yan na tad ākāra-antara-vad aviśeṣāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:2717: 07524 tac cet sāmānyasya rūpam ananyat tad eva tad bhavati / atattve
T11dhkpvsvu:2724: 07601 kvacid anāśrayād anyasya api vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāva-ādeḥ sambandhasya
T11dhkpvsvu:2729: 07604 darśanena eka-vṛtteḥ pratyayasya anyatra vṛttim icchaṃs tattvānyattve
T11dhkpvsvu:2734: 07607 prakṛtiś ca tasya āśraya iti nirloṭhitam etat /
T11dhkpvsvu:2739: 07610 vijñāna-santateḥ sarva-artha-darśaneṣv anapekṣya api tad-bhedaṃ tathā
T11dhkpvsvu:2743: na hi teṣv atathābhūteṣu kiṃcid vyatiriktam avyatiriktaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:2749: tena avaśyaṃ hi tatra bhedo nāntarīyakatvād
T11dhkpvsvu:2750: 07617 eṣṭavyaḥ / sa eva sāmānya-kārye paryāpta iti niḥprayojanā
T11dhkpvsvu:2752: yadi satsv asatsu vā bhāveṣu sāmānya-buddhir
T11dhkpvsvu:2753: 07619 na iyam arthavatī kevalaṃ viplava eva iti na asmākam asyā viṣaya-
T11dhkpvsvu:2754: 07620 nirūpaṇaṃ prati kaścid ādaraḥ kvacid avisaṃvādo asyā vastuni
T11dhkpvsvu:2756: 07622 pratyakṣa-vad atathābhāve api bhāvād iti nivedayiṣyāmo niveditaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:2757: 07623 ca / bheda-viṣayatvaṃ punar asyā bahulaṃ bhinna-padārtha-
T11dhkpvsvu:2761: api ca ayaṃ sāmānyam artha-antaraṃ kalpayan
T11dhkpvsvu:2762: 07701 svāśraya-mātra-gataṃ vā kalpayet sarva-gataṃ vā ākāśa-ādi-vat /
T11dhkpvsvu:2765: 07704 sambhavaḥ / yasmāt tat pūrva-dravyād utpitsu dravyaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:2768: na hy anya-dravya-vṛtter bhāvasya tato avicalato
T11dhkpvsvu:2771: 07709 na ca tatra āsīt asti paścān /
T11dhkpvsvu:2772: 07710 na ca tatra utpanno na kutaścid āyāta iti ka imaṃ vyāghāta-bhāram
T11dhkpvsvu:2773: 07711 udvoḍhuṃ samartho anyatra jāḍyāt / api ca
T11dhkpvsvu:2779: 07716 bhinna-deśayor hi bhāvayoḥ sambandho dvidhā bhavet /
T11dhkpvsvu:2783: na hi sa avayavatvam antareṇa bhinna-
T11dhkpvsvu:2788: ekasya ādheyasya tatra sthānaṃ tadā eva
T11dhkpvsvu:2789: 07722 tatra tena eva ātmanā asthānam iti tat-sthita-asthita-ātmanor ekasya
T11dhkpvsvu:2793: 07803 syāt / tathā ca gām apy aśva iti pratīyāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:2802: 07809 svasmād acalataḥ sthānād vṛttir ity atiyuktimat //153//
T11dhkpvsvu:2803: 07810 yatra asau vartate bhāvas tena sambadhyate api na /
T11dhkpvsvu:2804: 07811 tad-deśinaṃ ca vyāpnoti kim apy etan mahādbhutam //154//
T11dhkpvsvu:2806: yasya tu sarva-gataṃ sāmānyaṃ tasya api
T11dhkpvsvu:2807: 07813 vyaktā eva ekatra sā vyaktyā abhedāt sarvatragā yadi /
T11dhkpvsvu:2809: 07815 na jāter nityāyāḥ kācid vyaktir iti niṣiddham etat /
T11dhkpvsvu:2811: 07816 anapekṣita-para-upaskārā dṛśyeta vā na vā kadācit tasmin svabhāve
T11dhkpvsvu:2815: 07818 api vyaktiṃ vyāpiny ekatra vyaktyā bheda-abhāvād vyaktā
T11dhkpvsvu:2816: 07819 eva sarvatra iti vyakti-śūnyeṣv api pradeśeṣu dṛśyeta /
T11dhkpvsvu:2822: 07825 āśraya-śūnyeṣu pradeśeṣu na dṛśyata iti pratisamādadhīta tasya apy
T11dhkpvsvu:2823: 07826 asty eva āśraya-indriya-saṃyoga upakāraka iti tatas tad-darśī yathā-
T11dhkpvsvu:2825: na hi tasyāṃ dṛśyamānāyām adṛṣṭaṃ tadīyaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:2831: 07904 hi vyañjakaḥ pradīpa-ādiḥ svarūpa-śūnye deśe sva-vyaṅgyaṃ na
T11dhkpvsvu:2839: api ca anena kim asambhavad abhisamīkṣya
T11dhkpvsvu:2842: 07910 vyatirekiṇīṣu vyaktiṣv anvayinaḥ pratyayasya ayogāt / katham
T11dhkpvsvu:2844: 07912 pācaka-ādiṣv abhinnena vinā apy arthena vācakaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2847: na hi teṣv anyad ekam abhinnam
T11dhkpvsvu:2852: kim idānīṃ karmaṇā anyena vā / bhinnam
T11dhkpvsvu:2853: 07917 abhinna-pratyaya-hetur na bhavati ity ekaṃ sāmānyam iṣṭam /
T11dhkpvsvu:2854: 07918 tad yadi bhinnam api karma-abhinnam pratyayaṃ janayet /
T11dhkpvsvu:2856: 07919 ko aparādhaḥ kṛto yena tās tathā na iṣyante /
T11dhkpvsvu:2858: 07920 asya idam iti vyatireka-pratītir atad-ākāra-viśeṣavatī ca na
T11dhkpvsvu:2860: uktam atra yathā vyatireko viśeṣa-pratyayāś ca
T11dhkpvsvu:2868: 08001 na hy artha-antara-sambandhinī jātir artha-antare pratyaya-hetur
T11dhkpvsvu:2870: pācaka-karmasu ca karma-jātir na ca tāni
T11dhkpvsvu:2876: 08006 ca pākaḥ pāka iti hi tataḥ syān na punaḥ pācaka iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:2880: 08009 na hy anityaṃ karma sarvadā asti /
T11dhkpvsvu:2882: 08010 niruddhe karmaṇi na pācaka ity ucyeta /
T11dhkpvsvu:2885: 08012 asambandhān na sāmānyaṃ na ayuktam śabda-kāraṇam //158//
T11dhkpvsvu:2887: 08014 vinaṣṭe hi karmaṇi tat sāmānyaṃ na karmaṇi na kartari iti sambaddha-
T11dhkpvsvu:2888: 08015 sambandhe apy asya na asti ity asambandhān na śabda-jñāna-
T11dhkpvsvu:2895: 08021 asad hi nirupākhyaṃ kathaṃ nimittaṃ syāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:2900: anyac ca vyakty-ādikaṃ na iṣṭam ity
T11dhkpvsvu:2902: tathā ca na jāti-siddhis tasyā jñāna-abhidhānayoḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2905: 08105 na karma na sāmānyam iti cet
T11dhkpvsvu:2907: 08107 na hi śaktir nāma kiṃcid anyad eva pācaka-ādīnām / tasyā eva
T11dhkpvsvu:2909: 08109 tasya upayoga iti cet kim idānīṃ śaktyā /
T11dhkpvsvu:2914: 08112 eva upayujyata iti kiṃ na iṣyata iti kim antarāle anarthikayā śaktyā /
T11dhkpvsvu:2915: 08113 tasmāc śaktir iti dravyam eva tat-kāryaṃ tac ca na anveti iti / tato
T11dhkpvsvu:2917: 08115 sāmānyaṃ pācakatva-ādi yadi prāg eva tad bhavet /
T11dhkpvsvu:2918: 08116 vyaktaṃ sattā-ādi-van no cen na paścād aviśeṣataḥ //160//
T11dhkpvsvu:2919: 08117 atha api pācakatvam iti sāmānyam eva kiṃcid bhavet / saty arthe
T11dhkpvsvu:2922: 08119 syāt / yāvanti hi sāmānyāny arthe samavāya-dharmāṇi tāni saha
T11dhkpvsvu:2925: 08121 paścād apy aviśeṣān na tat-samavāyaḥ syāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:2927: 08122 vaiguṇyād hi sa tasya prāṅ na āsīt tatra eva ca asya svabhāve
T11dhkpvsvu:2928: 08123 sthitasya paścād bhavati iti duranvayam etat /
T11dhkpvsvu:2930: 08125 na apekṣa-atiśaye apy asya kṣaṇikatvāt kriyā kutaḥ //161//
T11dhkpvsvu:2931: 08126 karma-upakāram apekṣya pācakatvaṃ dravyeṇa vyajyata iti cet /
T11dhkpvsvu:2932: 08201 sthira-svabhāvasya anatiśayād aviśeṣa-ādhāyini kā apekṣā / atiśaye
T11dhkpvsvu:2933: 08202 vā kṣaṇikatvāt karmaṇaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ svabhāva-bhūtasya anyānyasya
T11dhkpvsvu:2934: 08203 atiśayasya utpattes tad api kṣaṇikaṃ syāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:2936: 08204 kriyā kutaḥ yad-apekṣaṃ vyañjakaṃ syāt / kathaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:2937: 08205 tarhi idānīm asty abhinne vastuni jñāna-śabdayor anvayinor vṛttiḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2939: nanu tad eva idaṃ cintyate kathaṃ teṣv
T11dhkpvsvu:2940: 08207 api iti / cintitam etad yathā na teṣu sambhavati /
T11dhkpvsvu:2948: 08210 na punar vikalpa-abhidhānayor vastu-sattā samāśraya ity ukta-prāyam
T11dhkpvsvu:2950: 08212 aparāpara-darśane apy anvayinos tayor darśanāt / na ca tatra
T11dhkpvsvu:2951: 08213 tan-nibandhanaḥ kaścit svabhāvo asti paraspara-virodhinor yugapad
T11dhkpvsvu:2955: 08215 bhavat kvacid bhavati kvacin na bhavati iti niyamam
T11dhkpvsvu:2956: 08216 arhati / na khalu vai tad animittaṃ vāsanā-viśeṣa-nimittatvāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:2957: 08217 bāhyaṃ tu tathābhūtaṃ dṛśyaṃ na asti iti brūmaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2962: 08220 ca te asatsu utpadyanta iti sarvatra sarva-ākāraḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2965: uktaṃ ca atra kiṃcid asmābhiḥ prakṛtyā
T11dhkpvsvu:2966: 08222 api kecid eka-jñāna-kāryāḥ svabhāva-bhedād iti / api ca /
T11dhkpvsvu:2967: 08223 tulye bhede yayā jātiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati /
T11dhkpvsvu:2968: 08224 kvacin na anyatra sa eva astu śabda-jñāna-nibandhanam //162//
T11dhkpvsvu:2970: 08226 na nivṛttiṃ vihāya asti yadi bhāva-anvayo aparaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2971: 08227 ekasya kāryam anyasya na syād atyanta-bhedataḥ //163//
T11dhkpvsvu:2972: 08228 yady ete bhāvā vyāvṛttiṃ muktvā svabhāvena kenacid anvayinā
T11dhkpvsvu:2973: 08301 śūnyāḥ / na eṣāṃ bahūnām ekaṃ kāryaṃ syāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:2975: 08302 janakaḥ / na hi so anyasya asti /
T11dhkpvsvu:2976: yo asti sa na janako vyatirekas ya
T11dhkpvsvu:2979: 08304 ca aparatra na asti iti na aparaṃ janayet /
T11dhkpvsvu:2980: sa hi tasya svabhāvo yo janakaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:2984: 08307 yady ekātmatayā anekaḥ kāryasya ekasya kārakaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2985: 08308 ātmā ekatra api so asti iti vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ //164//
T11dhkpvsvu:2986: 08309 yady eka-svabhāvatvād aneka ekasya kārakaḥ sa teṣām abhinnaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:2990: 08312 na apaity abhinnaṃ tad-rūpaṃ viśeṣāḥ khalv apāyinaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:2991: 08313 na hi tasya abhinna-svabhāvasya artha-antare viśeṣo asti /
T11dhkpvsvu:2993: 08314 hāneḥ / sa ca tatra apy asti iti na eka-sthitāv api tasya apāyo asti / ye
T11dhkpvsvu:2994: 08315 viśeṣās teṣāṃ saha-sthiti-niyama-abhāvāt syād apāyaḥ / na ca te
T11dhkpvsvu:3002: 08320 tat-kāryam aneka-sahakāri-sādhāraṇam eka-viśeṣa-apāye api na bhavati /
T11dhkpvsvu:3003: 08321 punar apy avikaleṣu sarveṣu viśeṣeṣu bhavati /
T11dhkpvsvu:3006: kāryaṃ hi kutaścid bhāva-dharmi yan na bhavati
T11dhkpvsvu:3010: avikale api tasminn abhavat tasya ajanaka-ātmatāṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:3013: tasmin sati niyamena bhavatas tad-anyasmād utpatti-
T11dhkpvsvu:3016: 08403 sāmānyaṃ / tatas ta eva vastu / yasmāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:3017: 08404 sa pāramārthiko bhāvo ya eva arthakriyā-kṣamaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3018: 08405 idam eva hi vastv-avastunor lakṣaṇaṃ yad arthakriyā-yogyatā ayogyatā
T11dhkpvsvu:3022: 08409 na anveti yo anveti na tasmāt kārya-sambhavaḥ //166//
T11dhkpvsvu:3023: 08410 tasmāt sarvaṃ sāmānyam anarthakriyā-yogyatvād avastu / vastu
T11dhkpvsvu:3024: 08411 tu viśeṣa eva tata eva tan-niṣpatteḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3026: 08412 ekasya janakaṃ rūpam anyasya na asti ity ajanakaḥ syāt / janakatve
T11dhkpvsvu:3029: 08414 tena ātmanā hi bhede api hetuḥ kaścin na ca aparaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3031: 08416 ekasya janakād ātmano bhidyamānāḥ sarve samaṃ janakā na vā
T11dhkpvsvu:3032: 08417 aviśeṣe kaścid iti syād etad yady eṣāṃ na viśeṣaḥ sambhavet / tato bheda-
T11dhkpvsvu:3033: 08418 api kutaścid ātma-atiśayāt kaścij janako na aparaḥ / sa hi
T11dhkpvsvu:3036: 08420 arhanti kim agnir dahaty uṣṇo vā na udakam iti / etāvat tu
T11dhkpvsvu:3040: tasmāt svabhāvo asya sva-hetor ity ucyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3041: 08423 tasya api taj-janana-ātmatā tad-anyasmād ity anādir hetu-paraṃparā
T11dhkpvsvu:3042: 08501 bhinnānāṃ hi kaścid hetur na anyaḥ svabhāvād ity atra na kiṃcid
T11dhkpvsvu:3045: 08504 abhedāt / svabhāvena eva viśvasya svātma-vad vibhāga-utpatti-sthiti-
T11dhkpvsvu:3046: 08505 nirodha-ādayo na syuḥ tathā upalakṣaṇād abhedasya / idam eva hi
T11dhkpvsvu:3047: 08506 bheda-abheda-lakṣaṇam eka-ākārasya api vyatireko avyatirekaś ca /
T11dhkpvsvu:3049: 08508 bhedo api tena na evaṃ ced /
T11dhkpvsvu:3050: 08509 na vai sarva-ākāra-avyatirekaṃ brūmo yena evaṃ syāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:3052: 08510 bhinno na anya iti bhedān na sahotpatty-ādayaḥ / evaṃ tarhi
T11dhkpvsvu:3055: 08513 bhedaḥ / sthāna-asthānayor ekātma-āśrayatve ko anyo dharmo bhedaka
T11dhkpvsvu:3056: 08514 iti nānātvam eva kvacin na syāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:3058: 08515 abhyupagamān nāma kevalaṃ na iṣṭaṃ syān na vastv
T11dhkpvsvu:3059: 08516 ity uktam / tad ime na ekayogakṣemā bhāvāḥ bhinnā eva
T11dhkpvsvu:3061: 08518 tad idam artha-antaram anāyattam ajanyatvād asya idaṃ sāmānyaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:3062: 08519 bhedo vā iti vyapadeśaṃ na arhati /
T11dhkpvsvu:3066: 08522 na hy anyāpoho nāma kiṃcit tasya ca svabhāva-anuṣaṅgiṇyaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:3068: 08524 upaplavaś ca sāmānya-dhiyas tena apy adūṣaṇā //169//
T11dhkpvsvu:3069: 08525 nirviṣayam eva khalv idaṃ mithyā-jñānaṃ yad anekatra eka-ākāram
T11dhkpvsvu:3070: 08601 iti na tad-viṣayasya abhāvāt sthitir asthitir vā /
T11dhkpvsvu:3073: 08603 yat tasya janakaṃ rūpaṃ tato anyo janakaḥ katham /
T11dhkpvsvu:3074: 08604 tatra na brūmo anyasya taj-janakaṃ rūpaṃ na asti iti / kiṃ tarhi /
T11dhkpvsvu:3075: 08605 yad ekasya taj-janakaṃ tad anyasya na ity anyo api svarūpeṇa eva
T11dhkpvsvu:3078: 08607 ca svabhāvena iti ko atra virodhaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3081: tena eva ca tat-kāryaṃ kartavyam iti ko
T11dhkpvsvu:3084: 08611 ity uktam / na ca te viśeṣās tena ātmanā parasparam anuyanti /
T11dhkpvsvu:3085: 08612 yad ekasya janakaṃ rūpam anyasya tan na asti /
T11dhkpvsvu:3089: 08615 syād etat satyaṃ viśeṣā janakāḥ na punas teṣāṃ viśiṣṭam eva
T11dhkpvsvu:3090: 08616 rūpaṃ kiṃ tv abhinnam api tad-eka-śakti-yogāj janakāḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3092: 08618 saty api sāmānye rūpe na tena te janakās tasya anapāyād eka-sthitāv
T11dhkpvsvu:3093: 08619 api kārya-utpatti-prasaṅgād ity uktaṃ prāk / kiṃ ca /
T11dhkpvsvu:3098: 08623 sarva-arthān manyate tasya ayam artheṣu buddhi-pratibhāsa-bhedo
T11dhkpvsvu:3102: tathā ca ayaṃ pravibhāgo na syād ekātma-vat /
T11dhkpvsvu:3107: 08701 sa eva arthas tasya vyāvṛttayo apare //170//
T11dhkpvsvu:3108: 08702 tat-kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca uktaṃ tat svalakṣaṇam iṣyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3110: 08704 yad arthakriyākāri tad eva vastv ity uktam /
T11dhkpvsvu:3112: 08705 yat punar etat sāmānyaṃ nāma tat tasya eva aparasmād bhedaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3113: 08706 na hi tasya arthatve dṛśyasya rūpa-anupalakṣaṇaṃ yuktam / tad-
T11dhkpvsvu:3115: 08708 yathā abheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaṃ sarva-sādhanam /
T11dhkpvsvu:3116: 08709 tathā bheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaṃ sarva-sādhanam //173//
T11dhkpvsvu:3117: 08710 yad uktam / kathaṃ taj-janaka-svabhāvād bhinno asya janakaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:3118: 08711 syāt / janakatve vā aviśeṣāt sarvo janakaḥ syād iti / uktam
T11dhkpvsvu:3119: 08712 atra / yady aviśeṣaḥ syāt syād etad iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:3121: 08713 abheda-vādino abheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaḥ sarvasya janaka iti tathā
T11dhkpvsvu:3123: 08715 bhede hi kārakaṃ kiṃcid vastu-dharmatayā bhavet /
T11dhkpvsvu:3124: 08716 abhede tu virudhyete tasya ekasya kriyā-akriye //174//
T11dhkpvsvu:3126: 08718 eva kārakāḥ syuḥ na anye atat-svabhāvatvād ity atra na eva kiṃcid
T11dhkpvsvu:3128: ekatve tu tasya tatra eva tathā kārakatvam akārakatvaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:3130: 08721 bhedo apy asty akriyātaś cen na kuryuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3131: 08722 na vai sarva-ākāra-avivekaṃ brūmo bhedasya api bhāvāt / tasmāt
T11dhkpvsvu:3135: 08725 paryāyeṇa atha kartṛtvaṃ sa kiṃ tasya eva vastunaḥ //175//
T11dhkpvsvu:3136: 08726 atha api syān na eva kaścid akārako asti /
T11dhkpvsvu:3138: 08727 upayogāt / śakter vā vipariṇatāyās tan-niveśinyā rūpa-antareṇa
T11dhkpvsvu:3139: 08728 upayogāt / sa eva khalv ayaṃ paryāyo bheda-āśraya ekasya katham /
T11dhkpvsvu:3142: 08802 hānir iti yat kiṃcid etat / kiṃ ca /
T11dhkpvsvu:3145: 08805 bhāvāś ced abhinnena ātmanā svātmabhūtena bhedinas tadvantaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:3146: 08806 syuḥ tad-abhinna-svabhāva-ātmatvād bhedasya api kutaḥ parasparaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:3147: 08807 bhedaḥ / atha na sa tasya samāna ātmā /
T11dhkpvsvu:3149: 08808 tena api na yuktaṃ tathā bhavitum /
T11dhkpvsvu:3152: na hy ayaṃ pravṛtti-nivṛttimān svabhāva eko yuktaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3155: 08812 na hi kvacid asya ekāntiko bhedo abhedo vā vivekena vyavasthāpanāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:3158: 08815 bhedaḥ sāmānyam ity etad yadi bhedas tadātmanā //177//
T11dhkpvsvu:3160: 08817 yadi sāmānya-viśeṣayor yam ātmānam āśritya sāmānyaṃ viśeṣa
T11dhkpvsvu:3161: 08818 iti sthitis tena ātmanā bhedas tadā bheda eva /
T11dhkpvsvu:3163: 08819 tayoḥ svātmānau tau ced vyatirekiṇau vyatireka eva sāmānya-
T11dhkpvsvu:3168: 08823 vyatireke ca bheda-sāmānyayor na bhedaḥ sāmānyān na sāmānyaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:3171: 08826 yam ātmānaṃ puraskṛtya puruṣo ayaṃ pravartate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3173: 08828 cintyete svātmanā bhedo vyāvṛttyā ca samānatā /
T11dhkpvsvu:3174: 08901 asty eva vastu na anveti pravṛtty-ādi-prasaṅgataḥ //180 /
T11dhkpvsvu:3175: 08902 sarva eva gaur aśvād bhinno abhinno vā iti bhedam abhedaṃ vā
T11dhkpvsvu:3176: 08903 pṛcchan viśeṣam eva bhāvasya svabhāva-ākhyam adhikṛtya pravartate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3184: 08907 pratyupasthāpitam arthaṃ bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā pṛcchann
T11dhkpvsvu:3185: 08908 artha-antara-upakṣepeṇa tatra kim iti dvi-mukha-buddhiḥ kriyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3186: 08909 tasmād yo asya ātmā ananya-sādhāraṇo yaṃ puraskṛtya puruṣo
T11dhkpvsvu:3187: 08910 viśiṣṭa-arthakriyā-arthī pravartate yathā gor vāha-doha-ādau na anya-
T11dhkpvsvu:3188: 08911 sambhavino arthasya yathā yuddha-praveśe sa eva svabhāvo
T11dhkpvsvu:3199: 08917 sāmānyasya ca vyāvṛtti-lakṣaṇasya svabhāva-bhūtasya ca sāmānyasya
T11dhkpvsvu:3202: 08919 arthakriyā-arthī samaṃ dvayor api pravarteta / eko api
T11dhkpvsvu:3205: 08921 tat tulyam iti so api kiṃ na karoti /
T11dhkpvsvu:3206: 08922 etena eva yad ahrīkāḥ kiṃ apy aślīlam ākulam /
T11dhkpvsvu:3208: 08924 yad ayam ahrīkaḥ syād uṣṭro dadhi syān na iti kim apy aślīlam
T11dhkpvsvu:3209: 08925 ayuktam aheya-upādeyam apariniṣṭhānād ākulaṃ pralapanti / tad
T11dhkpvsvu:3213: 08928 codito dadhi khādeti kim uṣṭraṃ na abhidhāvati //182//
T11dhkpvsvu:3214: 09001 tathā hy uṣṭro api syād dadhi na api sa eva uṣṭraḥ ye na anyo api syād
T11dhkpvsvu:3215: 09002 uṣṭraḥ / tathā dadhy api syād uṣṭraḥ na api tad eva dadhi yena anyad
T11dhkpvsvu:3217: tad anayor ekasya api kasyacit tad-rūpa-abhāvasya
T11dhkpvsvu:3218: 09004 abhāvāt svarūpasya vā atad-bhāvinaḥ sva-niyatasya abhāvāt
T11dhkpvsvu:3220: dadhi khādeti codita uṣṭram api khādet /
T11dhkpvsvu:3221: 09006 atha asty atiśayaḥ kaścid yena bhedena vartate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3222: 09007 sa eva dadhi so anyatra na asti ity anubhayaṃ param //183//
T11dhkpvsvu:3223: 09008 atha anayoḥ kaścid atiśayo asti yena ayaṃ tathā coditaḥ kṣīra-vikāra
T11dhkpvsvu:3228: sa ca tādṛśaḥ svabhāvo anyatra na asti iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:3230: 09012 arthinaḥ / tasmāt tan na ubhaya-rūpam ity ekānta-vādaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3232: 09014 sarvātmatve ca sarveṣāṃ bhinnau syātāṃ na dhī-dhvanī /
T11dhkpvsvu:3234: 09016 so ayam ahrīkaḥ kvacid apy ekam ākāraṃ pratiniyatam apaśyan
T11dhkpvsvu:3238: 09019 vādo na syāt syād uṣṭro dadhi syān na iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:3242: 09021 kvacit pratiniyamāt tat-pratibhāsa-bheda-kṛta eva tayo rūpayoḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:3245: 09023 tathā ca na ekas tad-ubhaya-rūpaḥ syād iti mithyā-vāda
T11dhkpvsvu:3246: 09024 eṣaḥ / sthitam etat na bhāvānāṃ kaścit svabhāva-anvayo asti
T11dhkpvsvu:3252: yeṣāṃ tu nirupākhyānāṃ svabhāva eva na asti
T11dhkpvsvu:3257: 09104 ayogāt / tathā ca sarvatra ayam anvaya-vyatireka-āśrayo vyavahāro
T11dhkpvsvu:3258: 09105 na syāt uṣṇa-svabhāvo agnir na anuṣṇa ity api /
T11dhkpvsvu:3262: 09107 agni-svabhāvasya apratipattir iti vyāmūḍhaṃ jagat syāt / syād etat
T11dhkpvsvu:3263: 09108 na tatra kasyacid asato niṣedhaḥ anuṣṇaṃ sad eva artha-antaraṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:3267: 09110 asat tatra na asti iti deśa-kāla-dharma-niṣedha eva sarva-bhāveṣu
T11dhkpvsvu:3272: yasmān na tatra api deśa-ādīnāṃ pratiṣedho
T11dhkpvsvu:3276: 09115 api tulyo doṣo niṣedhād asati śabda-apravṛttir ity ādi /
T11dhkpvsvu:3282: na iha ghaṭo na idānīṃ na evam ity uktau
T11dhkpvsvu:3283: 09118 na anena sambandho asti na etad dharmā vā iti pratītiḥ / tathā
T11dhkpvsvu:3286: 09120 asya sambandho dharmo vā na asti iti matir na bhavati / na ca asyāḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:3287: 09121 kathaṃcid bhāve sambhavo abhāveṣu tathā abhāvāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:3289: 09122 abhāva-pratīter na ayam iha ity ādyā pratītiḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3294: sa eva hi śabdānāṃ na viṣayo
T11dhkpvsvu:3296: te cet pravṛttāḥ ko vacanasya niṣeddhā /
T11dhkpvsvu:3297: 09204 na hy avācyam arthaṃ buddhayaḥ samīhante /
T11dhkpvsvu:3304: 09207 api sambandhi-rūpa eva iti svarūpeṇa na abhidhīyate / tasmān
T11dhkpvsvu:3305: 09208 na abhāva-vat sambandhe api prasaṅgaḥ / api ca / ayam
T11dhkpvsvu:3306: 09209 abhāvam abhidheyaṃ bruvāṇaṃ prati pratividadhad abruvāṇaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:3308: vacane vā asya katham abhāvo anuktaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3314: 09213 nirviṣayasya naño aprayoga ity atra uttaraṃ vakṣyate / tasmāt
T11dhkpvsvu:3319: 09217 na āśaṅkyā eva siddhās te vyavacchedasya vācakāḥ //185//
T11dhkpvsvu:3320: 09218 vastu-vṛttīnāṃ śabdānāṃ kiṃ rūpam abhidheyam āhosvid bheda
T11dhkpvsvu:3325: 09221 bhāvasya / tasmād ayam eva sa mukhyo vivekaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3326: 09222 tasya tathā abhāva-khyāpinaḥ śabdāḥ kiṃ viveka-viṣayā ity asthānam
T11dhkpvsvu:3328: tasmāt siddham etat sarve śabdā viveka-viṣayā
T11dhkpvsvu:3331: 09302 avadhi-bheda-upakalpitair bhedair bhinneṣv iva pratibhātsu buddhau
T11dhkpvsvu:3336: 09305 hetur iti / sa ca ayaṃ hetutvena apadiśyamānaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3340: 09309 tena iyaṃ kṛtaka-śrutiḥ svabhāva-abhidhāyiny api para-upādhim enam
T11dhkpvsvu:3342: 09311 upādhi-bheda-apekṣaḥ kvacit svabhāvo hetur ucyate kvacid anapekṣaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:3343: 09312 sāmānyena yathā anityatva eva sattvam kvacit svabhāva-bhūta-
T11dhkpvsvu:3344: 09313 dharma-viśeṣa-parigraheṇa yathā tatra eva utpattiḥ / anayā
T11dhkpvsvu:3346: 09315 sattā-svabhāvo hetuś cen na sattā sādhyate katham /
T11dhkpvsvu:3348: 09317 yadi sattvam anityatve anyatra vā hetuḥ syāt sādhyam api kasmāt
T11dhkpvsvu:3349: 09318 na iṣyate / tat kila evaṃ prasādhyamānaṃ viśeṣībhavati /
T11dhkpvsvu:3350: 09319 na ca viśeṣaḥ sādhāyituṃ śakyate ananvayāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:3353: so ayaṃ viśeṣo na sādhya eva vyāhanyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3359: 09402 na kaścid arthaḥ siddhaḥ syād aniṣiddhaṃ ca tādṛśam //188//
T11dhkpvsvu:3360: 09403 na sarvathā sattā-sādhane viśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavati /
T11dhkpvsvu:3362: 09404 viśeṣaṇo asti kaścid dharmī iti prasādhayato anirdiṣṭa-svabhāva-viśeṣasya
T11dhkpvsvu:3363: 09405 kasyacit sattā-mātre virodha-abhāvāt na iha sattā-sādhana-
T11dhkpvsvu:3364: 09406 pratiṣedhaḥ kiṃ tu sa tathā asti kaścid iti kaṃcana asya bhedam
T11dhkpvsvu:3368: 09409 upātta-bhede sādhye asmin bhavad hetur ananvayaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3369: 09410 sattāyāṃ tena sādhyāyāṃ viśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavet //189//
T11dhkpvsvu:3370: 09411 sa hi dharmī pradhāna-lakṣaṇa eko nityaḥ sukha-ādy-ātmako anyo
T11dhkpvsvu:3371: 09412 vā iti yathākathaṃcid api viśeṣitas tat-svabhāvaḥ prasādhito bhavati /
T11dhkpvsvu:3373: yad api sattā-mātram anveti na tena
T11dhkpvsvu:3375: nanv evam agny-ādiṣv api prasaṅgaḥ / tatra api
T11dhkpvsvu:3379: na vai sa ādhāras taṃ viśeṣīkaroti /
T11dhkpvsvu:3380: 09417 tad-ayogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇād ity uktaṃ vakṣyate ca / tasmāt
T11dhkpvsvu:3382: 09419 na tathā iha api kvacit sattāyāḥ sādhanam /
T11dhkpvsvu:3384: 09420 eva arthasya kvacid abhāvān nirviśeṣaṇā eva sā /
T11dhkpvsvu:3389: tathā api kiṃ siddhaṃ syāt / anyatra
T11dhkpvsvu:3390: 09423 tu tad eva agni-sāmānyaṃ tatra asiddham iti sādhyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3392: 09424 tad-ayoga-virahiṇā sāmānyena anvayo na siddha eva /
T11dhkpvsvu:3396: 09426 agni-nāntarīyako darśanīyo yatra dhūmas tatra agnir iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:3398: 09427 mātreṇa vyāptaḥ siddho yatra eva svayaṃ dṛśyate tatra eva agni-
T11dhkpvsvu:3400: tatra ca sādhya-nirdeśena na kiṃcit / tatra
T11dhkpvsvu:3405: 09504 siddhaḥ / arthād eva agnes tat-pradeśa-ayogaṃ vyavacchinatti iti sa
T11dhkpvsvu:3407: na punas tathā asya upanyāsa-pūrvako anvayaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:3412: 09508 liṅgasya avyabhicāras tu dharmeṇa anyatra darśyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3414: 09510 tasmān na agny-ādi-sādhana-vat sattā-sādhanam apy anavadyam iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:3425: 09518 dharmo viruddho abhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham //191//
T11dhkpvsvu:3431: sa katham asiddha-sattāke syāt / yo hi
T11dhkpvsvu:3433: sa kathaṃ bhāvaṃ na icchet / svabhāva
T11dhkpvsvu:3434: 09603 eva hi kayācid apekṣayā dharma iti vyatirekī iva dharmiṇo
T11dhkpvsvu:3436: na hi dharma-dharmi-vācinoḥ śabdayor vācye kaścid
T11dhkpvsvu:3439: 09606 anāśrita-vastuno aparyudāsena vyatireka-mātrasya abhāve apy avirodhāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:3440: 09607 yathā na bhavati mūrta iti amūrtatvaṃ nirupākhye api
T11dhkpvsvu:3441: 09608 syāt / nirupākhyasya abhāvād na pratiṣedha-viṣayatā iti cet / tat kim
T11dhkpvsvu:3447: 09611 etad vyavaccheda-mātraṃ dvayor api sambhavad vipakṣa-pracāra-
T11dhkpvsvu:3449: 09613 kuryāt / sa ca svayaṃ sva-vāca-ubhaya-dharmatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ sato
T11dhkpvsvu:3450: 09614 anyatra apy asya vṛttiṃ bhāṣate sattāyāṃ ca avyabhicāram iti
T11dhkpvsvu:3453: 09616 arthasya vyavacchedaṃ hetuṃ sattāyāṃ vadato asya viruddho
T11dhkpvsvu:3454: 09617 hetuḥ syāt / tasya bhāve kvacid asambhavāt abhāve ca bhāva-
T11dhkpvsvu:3456: tad ayaṃ triprakāro api dharmaḥ sattā-
T11dhkpvsvu:3457: 09619 sādhane na hetu-lakṣaṇa-bhāk na ca anyā gatir asti / tasmān na
T11dhkpvsvu:3460: 09621 vastu-dharme siddha-sattāke dharmiṇi na asiddhiḥ / tena ca
T11dhkpvsvu:3461: 09622 sādhya-dharmeṇa vyāptir yadi kathaṃcin niścīyate na virodha-
T11dhkpvsvu:3464: 09624 samāśraye vā tat-svabhāvatayā gamako na kaścid gamakaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3467: 09701 vācyaḥ / na hi prakāśatayā prakāśayan pradīpas tad-rūpa-apratipattau
T11dhkpvsvu:3471: 09705 tad-dharma-niścayād eva niścito vyāpakatvena tasya dharmiṇo
T11dhkpvsvu:3474: 09708 tasya vyāpyasya dharmasya ayaṃ nivartako vyāpako dharmaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:3476: evaṃ hy ayam asya vyāpakaḥ siddho
T11dhkpvsvu:3477: 09710 bhavati yady asya abhāve na bhavet /
T11dhkpvsvu:3480: 09712 hi prayogaḥ sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca / yathā āhur
T11dhkpvsvu:3482: na anayor vastutaḥ kaścid bhedo anyatra
T11dhkpvsvu:3484: sādharmyeṇa api hi prayoge arthād vaidharmya-
T11dhkpvsvu:3485: 09715 gatiḥ asati tasmin sādhyena hetor anvaya-abhāvāt / tathā
T11dhkpvsvu:3486: 09716 vaidharmye apy anvaya-gatiḥ asati tasmin sādhya-abhāve hetv-abhāvasya
T11dhkpvsvu:3488: 09718 anityatve yathā kāryam akāryaṃ vā avināśini /
T11dhkpvsvu:3491: 09720 tat sarvam anityam yathā ghaṭa-ādayaḥ śabdaś ca kṛtaka
T11dhkpvsvu:3492: 09721 iti kṛtakatvasya apy anityatvena vyāptiṃ pradarśya śabdas ya
T11dhkpvsvu:3493: 09722 kṛtakatve kathite sāmarthyād eva anityaḥ śabda iti / tasmān
T11dhkpvsvu:3496: 09724 vyatireke api na anityatva-abhāve kṛtakatvaṃ bhavati śabdaś ca
T11dhkpvsvu:3497: 09725 kṛtaka iti / siddha-tat-svabhāvatayā tad-abhāve na bhavataḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3498: 09726 kṛtakatvasya śabde ca bhāva-khyātau tadātmanaḥ sato bhāva iti
T11dhkpvsvu:3499: 09727 sāmarthyāt siddheḥ pūrvavān na pratijñā-vacanam / anvayas tv
T11dhkpvsvu:3502: 09802 nivṛttiḥ / tasmāt tan-niyamaṃ prasādhya nivṛttir vaktavyā /
T11dhkpvsvu:3503: 09803 sā cet sidhyati tadātma-niyamam arthāt sūcayati iti siddho anvayaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3504: 09804 katham idānīṃ kṛtako avaśyam anitya iti pratyetavyo
T11dhkpvsvu:3507: 09807 na hi bhāvā vinaśyantas tad-bhāve hetum apekṣante / sva-hetor
T11dhkpvsvu:3509: tasmād yaḥ kaścit kṛtakaḥ sa prakṛtyā
T11dhkpvsvu:3511: 09810 sāpekṣāṇāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ na avaśyaṃbhāvitā īkṣyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3515: 09813 bāhulye api hi tad-hetor bhavet kvacid asambhavaḥ //194//
T11dhkpvsvu:3516: 09814 yady api bahulaṃ vināśa-kāraṇāni santi teṣām api sva-pratyaya-
T11dhkpvsvu:3517: 09815 adhīna-saṃnidhitvān na avaśyaṃ saṃnidhānam iti kaścin na vinaśyed
T11dhkpvsvu:3518: 09816 api / na hy avaśyaṃ hetavaḥ phalavanto vaikalya-pratibandha-
T11dhkpvsvu:3523: tad ayaṃ bhāvo anapekṣas tad-bhāvaṃ prati
T11dhkpvsvu:3526: nanv anapekṣāṇām api keṣāṃcit kvacin na avaśyaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:3530: 09825 apekṣā / tatra apy antyā kāraṇa-sāmagrī yā avyavahitā kārya-utpatteḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:3535: na ca tāṃ tatra kaścit pratibandhuṃ samarthaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3538: 09903 tadātmanaś ca apracyutasya tad-utpādanaṃ prati vaiguṇyaṃ kāraṇasya
T11dhkpvsvu:3540: 09905 yava-bīja-ādayo api śāly-aṅkure janye na sāpekṣāḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3544: 09907 yāvatā sa eva eṣāṃ svabhāvo na asti yas tad-utpādanaḥ śāli-bījasya
T11dhkpvsvu:3547: 09909 satāṃ vā sa eva svabhāvo na asti yo vinaśvaraḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3551: 09911 sva-hetor iti yo na tad-hetuḥ so atat-svabhāvaḥ syāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:3553: 09912 ca sa hetuḥ svarūpeṇa pratīta eva /
T11dhkpvsvu:3557: 09914 ayogāt tathā atra api niyama-hetur vaktavyo yata ime kecin
T11dhkpvsvu:3558: 09915 naśvara-ātmano jātā na ca atra kaścin niyāmakaḥ svabhāvasya asti
T11dhkpvsvu:3560: janmi-svabhāvo nāśī iti cet / na vai
T11dhkpvsvu:3561: 09917 janma nāśi-svabhāvasya hetuḥ na ca ahetoḥ svabhāva-niyamaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3562: 09918 tasmān na atra kaścid hetoḥ svabhāva-pravibhāgaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3564: 09919 phalasya api na asti ity asamānam /
T11dhkpvsvu:3566: 09920 kvacit kadācic ca bhāva-virodhinī tad-abhāvaṃ svabhāvena
T11dhkpvsvu:3567: 09921 sādhayati / yo hi svabhāvo nirapekṣaḥ sa yadi kadācid
T11dhkpvsvu:3568: 09922 bhavet kvacid vā tat-kāla-dravya-apekṣa iti nirapekṣa eva na
T11dhkpvsvu:3570: sa tarhi naśvaraḥ svabhāvo nirapekṣa iti ahetukaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:3571: 09924 syāt / na ahetukaḥ sattā-hetor eva bhāvāt tathā-utpatteḥ / sato
T11dhkpvsvu:3578: tad hi kiṃcid upalīyeta na vā yasya yatra kiṃcit
T11dhkpvsvu:3582: tasmān na iyam ākasmikī kvacit / kathaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:3585: 10003 uktaṃ ca atra na vināśo nāma anya eva kaścid bhāvāt svabhāva
T11dhkpvsvu:3586: 10004 eva hi nāśaḥ sa eva hy eka-kṣaṇa-sthāyī jāta iti / tam asya
T11dhkpvsvu:3587: 10005 mandāḥ svabhāvam ūrdhvaṃ vyavasyanti na prāk darśane api
T11dhkpvsvu:3588: 10006 pāṭava-abhāvād iti tad-vaśena paścād vyavasthāpyate vikāra-darśanena
T11dhkpvsvu:3590: tad ayaṃ sattā-vyatirekeṇa na anyat kiṃcid
T11dhkpvsvu:3597: 10012 siddhe hi bhāve kārako na taṃ karoti /
T11dhkpvsvu:3601: 10014 iti / kathaṃ kriyā-pratiṣedho vināśa iti hi te bhāva-abhāvaṃ manyante /
T11dhkpvsvu:3602: 10015 tad ayaṃ vināśa-hetur abhāvaṃ karoti iti prāptam / tatra
T11dhkpvsvu:3603: 10016 yady abhāvo nāma kaścit kāryaḥ syāt svabhāvaḥ sa eva bhāva iti
T11dhkpvsvu:3605: tasmād abhāvaṃ karoti iti bhāvaṃ na karoti iti
T11dhkpvsvu:3608: 10019 kim iti apekṣyata iti siddhā vināśaṃ praty anapekṣayā bhāvasya /
T11dhkpvsvu:3611: 10022 yatra nāma bhavaty asmād anyatra api svabhāvataḥ //196//
T11dhkpvsvu:3612: 10023 so ayaṃ kvacid bhavan dṛṣṭo anapekṣatvāt svabhāvata eva bhavati /
T11dhkpvsvu:3613: 10024 tathā anyatra api svabhāva-bhāvī viśeṣa-abhāvād iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:3614: 10025 yā kācid bhāva-viṣayā dvidhā eva anumitis tataḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3616: 10028 tasmāt dviprakārā eva vastu-viṣaya-anumitiḥ kārya-liṅgā svabhāva-
T11dhkpvsvu:3617: 10101 liṅgā ca / yathāsvaṃ vyāpini sādhye tayor eva pratibandhāt liṅgayor
T11dhkpvsvu:3621: 10105 tṛtīyas tu hetur anupalabdhir aviśeṣeṇa kvacid arthe gamaka ity
T11dhkpvsvu:3622: 10106 ucyate / san-niścaya-śabda-vyavahāra-pratiṣedhe hi sarvā eva anupalabdhir
T11dhkpvsvu:3627: tac ca pratipattṛ-vaśān na vastu-vaśāt / tāvad hi
T11dhkpvsvu:3628: 10110 sa bhāvo asya na asti yāvad atra apratipattiḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3630: 10111 vastutas tv anupalabhyamāno na san na asan / satām
T11dhkpvsvu:3631: 10112 api svabhāva-ādi-viprakarṣāt kadācid anupalambhāt tasya asatsv api
T11dhkpvsvu:3632: 10113 tulyatvāt / tad etat pratipattuḥ pramāṇa-abhāvān nivṛttaṃ sattvam
T11dhkpvsvu:3634: 10115 tena yā api iyam anupalabdhir upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptānāṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:3641: na hy asti sambhavo yad upalabdhi-yogyaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:3642: 10119 sakaleṣv anyeṣu kāraṇeṣu san na upalabhyeta /
T11dhkpvsvu:3646: 10122 aliṅgāś ca kathaṃ teṣām abhāvo anupalabdhitaḥ //199//
T11dhkpvsvu:3647: 10123 so ayam asattāṃ sādhayann anupalabdhi-mātreṇa sarva-arthānāṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:3658: 10207 kāla-vyavahitā vā prakaraṇa-anupayogino dravya-viśeṣā na tān
T11dhkpvsvu:3668: 10213 sad-asan-niścaya-phalā na iti syād vā apramāṇatā /
T11dhkpvsvu:3669: 10214 na eva vā iyam anupalabdhiḥ pramāṇaṃ vyavasāya-phalatvāt pramāṇānām /
T11dhkpvsvu:3670: 10215 na hi pravṛtti-niṣedhe api iyaṃ niḥśaṅka-paricchedaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:3672: saṃśayād api kvacil lokasya pravṛtteḥ / tathātve
T11dhkpvsvu:3673: 10217 tan niravadyaṃ yadi niścaya-pūrvaṃ vyavahared iti sā iyam apravṛtti-
T11dhkpvsvu:3679: yat punar uktam apramāṇam anupalabdhir iti
T11dhkpvsvu:3681: 10301 yasya kasyacit svabhāvo na upalabhyate deśa-ādi-viprakarṣāt na
T11dhkpvsvu:3682: 10302 sa tad-anupalambha-mātreṇa asan nāma yathoktaṃ prāk / yo api
T11dhkpvsvu:3683: 10303 jñāpakasya liṅgasya abhāvād atīndriyaḥ pratikṣipyate arthaḥ svabhāva-
T11dhkpvsvu:3684: 10304 viśeṣo vā yathā na asti viraktaṃ ceto devatā-viśeṣo vā
T11dhkpvsvu:3685: 10305 na asti dāna-hiṃsā-virati-cetanānām abhyudaya-hetutā iti pratyakṣe
T11dhkpvsvu:3686: 10306 apy arthe phalasya ānantarya-abhāvād atat-phala-sādharmyād viparyasto
T11dhkpvsvu:3687: 10307 apavadeta api na tāvatā tad-abhāva eva vyavahitānām
T11dhkpvsvu:3698: 10315 kārye tu kāraka-ajñānam abhāvasya eva sādhakam //201//
T11dhkpvsvu:3699: 10316 svabhāva-abhāve sādhye tad-anupalambha eva apramāṇam ucyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3704: 10319 dṛṣṭā / na brūmaḥ kāraṇa-sthiti-kāla-bhāvī kāryam iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:3706: 10320 tu bhāva-utpattir na asti ity ucyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3707: na ca tathā sthāyī bhāvas tad-upādānaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:3709: 10322 yady asya kathaṃcid abhāvaḥ sidhyet tat-phalaṃ na asti iti niścīyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3711: 10324 svabhāva-abhāva eva liṅgini svabhāva-anupalambho api kaścit pramāṇam eva /
T11dhkpvsvu:3712: 10325 eva yady anupalabhyamāno vyāpakaḥ svabhāvo asya
T11dhkpvsvu:3716: 10401 yady asya kāraṇasya svabhāvasya vyāpakasya vā abhāvaḥ kutaścid
T11dhkpvsvu:3721: 10404 katham idānīṃ bhāvasya svayam anupalabdher abhāva-
T11dhkpvsvu:3725: 10408 bhāvo hi yadi bhaved yathāsvaṃ grāhakeṇa karaṇena upalabhya
T11dhkpvsvu:3726: 10409 eva bhavet / sa darśana-pratibandhiṣu vyavadhāna-ādiṣv asatsu upalabhya
T11dhkpvsvu:3727: 10410 eva / anupalabdhas tv asann iti niścīyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:3734: 10415 yo hi bhāvo yena saha na avatiṣṭhate tad-upādānayor anyonya-vaiguṇya-
T11dhkpvsvu:3735: 10416 āśrayatvena ārambha-virodhāt tayor viruddhayor ekasya bhāve
T11dhkpvsvu:3739: tata eva virodha-gater virodhāc ca abhāva-
T11dhkpvsvu:3740: 10419 sādhanāt / bhavatu nāma evaṃvidhāyā anupalabdher abhāva-
T11dhkpvsvu:3744: na hy asyāṃ kaścid dṛṣṭānto asti / kiṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:3749: 10424 katham adṛṣṭāntikā asattā-siddhiḥ sadṛṣṭāntatve vā anavasthā-prasaṅgaḥ /

T11dhkpvsvu:4388: sā ca anyatra apy ekena racite granthe anyasya

T11dhkpvsvu:4464: 12307 dṛṣṭer ekasya kaścid dharmaṃ vivecayan tat-svabhāva-sambhavinā
T11dhkpvsvu:4474: yadi tādṛśīṃ racanāṃ puruṣāḥ kartuṃ na śaknuyuḥ

T11dhkpvsvu:4492: 12325 syāt / tatra artha-antara-kalpane tad anyatra api tulyam ity artha-anirṇayāt
T11dhkpvsvu:4494: tathā ca sad apy anupayogam apauruṣeyam /
T11dhkpvsvu:4503: 12403 yujyate / teṣāṃ kriyā-sambhave akṣara-racanāyāṃ kaḥ pratighātaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:4504: 12404 puruṣāṇām / tasmān na kiṃcid aśakya-kriyam eṣām / katham

T11dhkpvsvu:4534: na api sann api sarvo draṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ / ata

T11dhkpvsvu:4541: 12424 yādṛśo ayam asambhavat-tat-sādhana-sampradāyo na iti nyāyaḥ /

T11dhkpvsvu:4549: 12430 na śakyate / na hi viśeṣaṇam aviruddhaṃ vipakṣeṇa asmād
T11dhkpvsvu:4561: 12505 tad-adhyayana-antara-pūrvakam ity api vyāptir na sidhyati /
T11dhkpvsvu:4570: 12511 sarvathā anāditā sidhyed evaṃ na apuruṣa-āśrayaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:4571: 12512 tasmād apauruṣeyatve syād anyo apy anara-āśrayaḥ //244//
T11dhkpvsvu:4572: 12513 puruṣa eva hi svayam abhyūhya parato vā ādhīyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:4574: 12514 karaṇānāṃ svayaṃ śabdā dhvananti yena apauruṣeyāḥ syuḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:4575: 12515 api syur apauruṣeyā yadi puruṣāṇām ādiḥ syāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:4593: 12526 samayānām api yathā aśruta-artha-vikalpa-saṃhāreṇa eva pravṛtteḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:4594: 12527 tat kiṃcit kutaścid āgatam ity ekasya upadeṣṭuḥ prabandhena abhāvād
T11dhkpvsvu:4598: 12530 ādi-kalpikeṣv adṛṣṭā eva vyavahārāḥ paścāt pravṛttā iṣyante /

T11dhkpvsvu:4601: 12603 tādṛśe apauruṣeyatve kaḥ siddhe api guṇo bhavet /

T11dhkpvsvu:4621: 12616 api ca / ayam apauruṣeyatvaṃ sādhayan varṇānāṃ vā sādhayed
T11dhkpvsvu:4623: 12618 anya-aviśeṣād varṇānāṃ sādhane kiṃ phalaṃ bhavet /

T11dhkpvsvu:4635: 12701 vākyaṃ na bhinnaṃ varṇebhyo vidyate anupalambhanāt //247//

T11dhkpvsvu:4646: na bhavati teṣām aviśeṣe api pada-vākya-antare
T11dhkpvsvu:4652: 12711 ca / varṇa-aviśeṣe api vākya-bhedāt pratipatti-bhedaḥ kārya-bhedaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:4654: tac ca atīndriyam iti kutaḥ syāt /

T11dhkpvsvu:4677: 12804 pṛthak pṛthag iti pratyekaṃ te vākyam /
T11dhkpvsvu:4685: 12809 sakṛc śrutau ca sarveṣāṃ kāla-bhedo na yujyate /

T11dhkpvsvu:4687: 12811 vākya-artha-siddher aneka-avayavatva-hānir vākyasya iti sakṛt sarva-

T11dhkpvsvu:4692: 12814 ca pṛthag arthavatām ekasmād eva tad-artha-siddher anyasya
T11dhkpvsvu:4694: sakṛc śrutau ca pṛthag artheṣv adṛṣṭa-sāmarthyānām
T11dhkpvsvu:4697: 12817 na / pṛthag asato rūpasya saṃghāte apy asambhavāt /

T11dhkpvsvu:4704: atha punar ekam eva anavayavaṃ vākyam /
T11dhkpvsvu:4706: 12823 ekatve api hy abhinnasya kramaśo gaty-asambhavāt //250//
T11dhkpvsvu:4719: 12902 prayuktair api yat kiṃcid vākyaṃ pratīyeta vinā vā
T11dhkpvsvu:4720: 12903 varṇaiḥ / tair anukramavadbhir akramasya upakāra-ayogāt / akrameṇa
T11dhkpvsvu:4723: 12905 vākye varṇāḥ santi tad ekam eva śabda-rūpaṃ vyañjaka-anukrama-

T11dhkpvsvu:4732: varṇānāṃ ca akrameṇa apratipatteḥ kuto akramam
T11dhkpvsvu:4735: 12914 ūrdhvam anyam aśakalaṃ śabda-ātmānam upalakṣayāmaḥ / na api
T11dhkpvsvu:4738: 12916 me syād iti kalyāṇa-kāmatā-mūḍha-matir antyāyāṃ buddhau samāpta-kalaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:4741: 12918 api pada-vākyayor varṇāḥ krama-viśeṣam antareṇa vibhāvyante /

T11dhkpvsvu:4749: 12923 anityaṃ yatna-sambhūtaṃ pauruṣeyaṃ kathaṃ na tat /

T11dhkpvsvu:4752: 12925 sattvasya deśa-ādi-niyamo na syād ity uktam /
T11dhkpvsvu:4759: 13003 atha tac śabda-rūpaṃ nityaṃ syād upalabhya-svabhāvaṃ ca /

T11dhkpvsvu:4774: 13012 utpādayanti khaṇḍayanti vā yena āvaraṇam iṣyante / na brūmas

T11dhkpvsvu:4818: 13110 janayeyuḥ / no cen na kadācit kasyacit kiṃcid ity ekānta eṣaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:4820: 13112 syād etat / na āvaraṇān nityaṃ sarve śabdā na śrūyante / api tu

T11dhkpvsvu:4829: tathā śabdo api yadi kiṃcid apekṣya
T11dhkpvsvu:4830: 13119 kāryaṃ kuryāt karotu pūrva-svabhāva-niyata ity etan na syāt /

T11dhkpvsvu:4843: 13127 sarvatra anupalambhaḥ syāt teṣām avyāpitā yadi /
T11dhkpvsvu:4850: sati ca upalambha-pratyaye sarvatra deśe tulyam

T11dhkpvsvu:4854: 13206 na hi kaścic śabda kvacin na asti iti sarve yugapad upalabhyeran

T11dhkpvsvu:4940: 13415 dhvanibhir vyajyamāne asmin vācake api kathaṃ na te //258//
T11dhkpvsvu:4941: 13416 krama-utpādibhir dhvani-bhāgair vyaktaḥ kila vācako vakti / tam
T11dhkpvsvu:4942: 13417 api te na eva sakṛt prakāśayanti /
T11dhkpvsvu:4956: 13424 tulya-upayoga iti dhvanibhir aśakya-sādhanaṃ kāryam / tatra api
T11dhkpvsvu:4958: tasmān na varṇeṣu vākye vā apauruṣeyatā /
T11dhkpvsvu:4959: 13426 varṇa-anupūrvī vākyaṃ cen na varṇānām abhedataḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:4960: 13501 na artha-antaram eva śabda-rūpaṃ vākyam apauruṣeyam / kiṃ tarhi /
T11dhkpvsvu:4963: 13503 iti cet / na / varṇānām ānupūrvyā abhedāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:4970: 13506 mātram avaśiṣṭaṃ sarvatra iti pūrvavat prasaṅgaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:4972: 13508 yady akṛtaka-anupūrvī varṇānāṃ te ca na bahavaḥ samāna-jātīyāḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:4973: 13509 yena kecid vyavasthita-kramāḥ syuḥ anye yathā iṣṭa-parāvṛttayaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:4974: 13510 kiṃ tarhi eka eva trailokye akāras tathā gakāraḥ tadā agnir ity
T11dhkpvsvu:4975: 13511 eva syāt na gaganam iti akāra-gakārayoḥ pūrvāpara-bhāvasya
T11dhkpvsvu:4992: 13521 sā ca iyam ānupūrvī vārṇānāṃ deśa-kṛtā vā syāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:5003: 13603 ca / tathā kāla-parihāreṇa vṛttiḥ kāla-paurvāparyam / yadā eko
T11dhkpvsvu:5005: tad api nityeṣu na sambhavati / sarvadā
T11dhkpvsvu:5010: 13607 anitya-avyāpitāyāṃ ca doṣaḥ prāg eva kīrtitaḥ //260//
T11dhkpvsvu:5011: 13608 atha mā bhūd ayaṃ doṣa ity anityān avyāpinaś ca varṇān icchet /
T11dhkpvsvu:5012: 13609 tāv api pakṣau prāg eva nirākṛtāv ity aparihāraḥ /

T11dhkpvsvu:5602: 15013 dṛṣṭo anyathā api vahny-ādir aduṣṭaḥ puruṣa-āgasā //284//
T11dhkpvsvu:5603: 15014 bhavantu nāma apauruṣeyā vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ tathā api sambhāvyam
T11dhkpvsvu:5621: 15024 ekatra yathārtha-jñāna-hetavo api sarvatra tathā bhavanti iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:5622: 15025 tathā śabdānām apy apauruṣeyatve apy ubhayaṃ syād iti / bhavatu
T11dhkpvsvu:5624: 15027 na punar nityeṣu śabdeṣv etad asti /
T11dhkpvsvu:5626: 15028 apy asty eva dharmas teṣām api saṃketa-balād anyathā-vṛtteḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:5627: 15029 kārya-janana-svabhāva-sthitau ca eṣāṃ samaya-āder apekṣaṇīyasya abhāvāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:5628: 15101 tataḥ pratītir artheṣu sarvasya sarvadā syāt / na ca asti
T11dhkpvsvu:5629: 15102 tasmān na śabdāḥ sthita-svabhāvā iti / api ca /
T11dhkpvsvu:5630: 15103 na jñāna-hetutā eva syāt tasminn akṛtake mate /
T11dhkpvsvu:5631: 15104 nityebhyo avastu-sāmarthyān na hi janma asti kasyacit //285//
T11dhkpvsvu:5632: 15105 yady akṛtakaḥ śabdo na tasmād artheṣu pratītir eva syāt / pratīti-
T11dhkpvsvu:5635: evam ayaṃ janako na evam iti vivecanīyasya
T11dhkpvsvu:5637: na yādṛśo asya ajanakas tādṛśa eva janako
T11dhkpvsvu:5642: 15111 kārya-sātatya-adarśanāc ca na te kathaṃcit kartāra ity
T11dhkpvsvu:5644: yā apy etā nitya-abhimateṣv ākāśa-ādiṣu pratipattayas
T11dhkpvsvu:5645: 15113 tā api na tat-svabhāva-bhāvinyaḥ / tathā hi /
T11dhkpvsvu:5647: 15115 jāyante buddhayas tatra kevalaṃ na artha-gocarāḥ //286//
T11dhkpvsvu:5649: 15117 iti tasmin saty asyāḥ kāraṇe yogye sā bhavaty eva /
T11dhkpvsvu:5650: 15118 tad yadi nityānāṃ padārthānāṃ svalakṣaṇe kasyacit jñānaṃ syāt
T11dhkpvsvu:5656: 15122 bhāvaḥ kenacid gṛhyamāṇas tat-kāraṇa-apekṣo yadi grahaṇam asya
T11dhkpvsvu:5657: 15123 janayet yuktaṃ yat tena eva gṛhyeta /
T11dhkpvsvu:5660: sarveṇa samaṃ gṛhyeta na vā kenacid iti
T11dhkpvsvu:5661: 15125 san kenacid dṛṣṭo na nityaḥ kaścid atīndriyaḥ syāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:5663: 15126 tasmād artha-sāmarthya-anapekṣāḥ samāropita-gocarā āntaram eva upādānaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:5669: 15202 eva iti / na hy agnir himasya bheṣajam ity ādiṣu śīta-pratighāta-
T11dhkpvsvu:5670: 15203 sāmarthyaṃ loka-prasiddhaṃ agneḥ khyāpyata iti sarvaṃ tathā
T11dhkpvsvu:5672: 15205 lokaḥ sva-saṃketam anuvidadhad evaṃ pratyeti āhosvic śabda-
T11dhkpvsvu:5675: 15207 śabdāḥ punar anyatra anyathā dṛśyanta iti loka-prasiddhy-anuvidhāne
T11dhkpvsvu:5678: 15209 darśane api sarveṣāṃ tathābhāvo na sidhyati /
T11dhkpvsvu:5680: 15210 api hy eṣāṃ kaścin mithyā-artha-niyato api syād iti svabhāva-
T11dhkpvsvu:5682: 15212 mithyātvaṃ kṛtakeṣv eva dṛṣṭam ity akṛtaṃ vacaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:5684: 15214 atha yan mithyā-arthaṃ vacanaṃ tad akhilaṃ kṛtakam iti hetu-vyatirekeṇa
T11dhkpvsvu:5686: 15216 satya-artham iti syād vinā apy anvayena /
T11dhkpvsvu:5690: 15218 asti / asambhave ca vijātīyasya gaty-antara-abhāvād iṣṭa-artha-siddhes
T11dhkpvsvu:5696: 15222 hetāv asambhave anukte bhāvas tasya api śaṅkyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:5698: 15224 yadi hetoḥ sādhya-vipakṣe abhāvaḥ sidhyet tadā sādhya-vyatirekaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:5704: na ca ekatra dṛṣṭasya anyatra asambhava
T11dhkpvsvu:5710: 15301 na asattā-siddhir ity uktaṃ sarvato anupalambhanāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:5712: 15303 na hy ayaṃ puruṣa-mātrakaḥ sarvaṃ draṣṭuṃ samartho yena asya
T11dhkpvsvu:5715: 15305 na vyabhicarati sa evaṃ bruvāṇaḥ śobheta adarśanān na asti iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:5716: 15306 tad ime svabhāva-deśa-kāla-viprakarṣeṇa santo apy anupalakṣyāḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:5719: 15308 vā sarva-darśī vacanasya akṛtakasya itarasya vā vibhāvayituṃ samarthaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:5720: 15309 pratipāditaṃ ca etat kvacit tathā dṛṣṭānām apy arthānāṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:5721: 15310 punaḥ kathaṃcid anyathābhāvaḥ yathā kvacid deśe madhurāṇi
T11dhkpvsvu:5723: 15312 ca idānīm atad-darśinā tāni pratikṣeptavyāny eva iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:5725: 15313 ca syād syān mithyā-arthaṃ ca iti na virodhaṃ paśyāmaḥ / na
T11dhkpvsvu:5726: 15314 hi iyam anupalabdhir adṛśya-ātmasv abhāva-sādhikā ity uktam / tena
T11dhkpvsvu:5727: 15315 yat kiṃcin mithyā-arthaṃ tat sarvaṃ pauruṣeyam ity aniścayād
T11dhkpvsvu:5729: 15317 anvayo vyatireko vā sattvaṃ vā sādhya-dharmiṇi /
T11dhkpvsvu:5732: ya eva tu ubhaya-niścita-vācī sa sādhanam dūṣaṇam
T11dhkpvsvu:5734: 15321 iti / ko hy adṛṣṭa-virodhasya sambhavaṃ pratyācakṣīta / tad ayaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:5737: 15324 sa eva asya sapakṣaḥ syāt sarvo hetur ato anvayī //291//
T11dhkpvsvu:5738: 15401 yat kiṃcin mithyā-arthaṃ tat sarvaṃ pauruṣeyam iti hetu-vipakṣeṇa
T11dhkpvsvu:5739: 15402 sādhya-vipakṣasya vyāptis tad-abhāve abhāva-siddhau syāt / tad-abhāve
T11dhkpvsvu:5743: 15405 pratiṣedha-dvayāc ca vidhi-siddhir iti kā ananvaya-avyatireka-vyāpti-
T11dhkpvsvu:5744: 15406 siddhiḥ / tan na kaścid hetur ananvayo nāma /
T11dhkpvsvu:5754: 15411 rūpatvāt / abhāva-rūpas tu vyatirekaḥ sa ca vyatiricyamāno
T11dhkpvsvu:5755: 15412 bhāvam upasthāpayati na evaṃ nairātmya-ādayaḥ svabhāva-viśeṣāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:5760: 15415 mātram anyathā nirupākhye kṛtakatva-ādy-ayogān na tato nairātmya-
T11dhkpvsvu:5767: 15419 tasya bhāva-rūpa-vyavacchede na bhāva-siddhiḥ syād iti
T11dhkpvsvu:5769: tathā anairātmye api na bhāva-siddhiḥ / yathā
T11dhkpvsvu:5770: 15421 na idaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ prāṇa-ādimattvād iti vipakṣayor
T11dhkpvsvu:5772: 15423 dṛṣṭam / tad-abhāve ca na asti iti svayaṃ na bhavad api prāṇa-ādīnāṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:5785: 15430 siddhāv api tad-asiddhir iti sādhye api prasaṅgaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:5791: 15502 dvairāśye tu śabdānām etat syād eka-nivṛttau gaty-antara-
T11dhkpvsvu:5792: 15503 abhāvāt / te tv anarthakā api syur iti na iṣṭasiddhiḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:5800: 15507 tathā ayam anarthakeṣv artha-vikalpaḥ puruṣa-kṛtaḥ na tu śabda-
T11dhkpvsvu:5802: 15509 na hi prakṛtyā prakāśanās tam apekṣante vahny-ādayaḥ / puruṣas
T11dhkpvsvu:5803: 15510 tu sva-samaya-vyāpāram ācakṣāṇa upadiśati iti nyāyyam /
T11dhkpvsvu:5805: 15512 ca eko naisargiko anyas tu pauruṣeya iti duravasānam / asti
T11dhkpvsvu:5815: 15518 arthavattā pauruṣeyī ca syāt pramāṇa-anurodhinī ca / api
T11dhkpvsvu:5816: 15519 ca idaṃ mantrā apauruṣeyāś ca iti vyāhataṃ paśyāmaḥ / tathā hi /
T11dhkpvsvu:5818: 15521 yuktam / yady ete mantrāḥ kasyacit samayo yathā mat-praṇītam /
T11dhkpvsvu:5820: 15523 anena arthena yojayāmi iti parārtha-paratā-anurodhena anyato vā kutaścid
T11dhkpvsvu:5821: 15524 hetoḥ kṛtaḥ syāt tadā mantra-prayogāt kadācit artha-
T11dhkpvsvu:5823: 15526 atha api bhāva-śaktiḥ syād anyatra apy aviśeṣataḥ //292//
T11dhkpvsvu:5826: 15528 svabhāva eṣa yad ime kathaṃcin niyuktāḥ phaladāḥ / tat tarhi
T11dhkpvsvu:5827: 15601 rūpaṃ varṇānāṃ sarvatra aviśiṣṭam iti yathākathaṃcit prayuktād
T11dhkpvsvu:5829: varṇā eva hi mantro na anyat kiṃcit / tat-kramo
T11dhkpvsvu:5831: 15604 kramasya arthāntaratvaṃ ca pūrvam eva nirākṛtam /
T11dhkpvsvu:5832: 15605 na varṇa-vyatirikto anyaḥ krama iti niveditam etat /
T11dhkpvsvu:5835: te ca aviśiṣṭāḥ sarvatra iti sarvadā phaladāḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:5836: 15607 syuḥ / upaplavas tv alpīyaso api kramasya bhraṃśād dṛṣṭaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:5838: 15609 ca / sarva-bhraṃśe tu kasyacid eva samayasya ananuṣṭhānād asaṃnidher
T11dhkpvsvu:5841: 15611 vā varṇa-ātmanas tat-krama-ātmano vā mantrasya artha-hetor
T11dhkpvsvu:5844: 15614 yato hi bhāva-śakteḥ phala-utpattiḥ sā avikalā iti na phala-vaikalyaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:5845: 15615 syāt / na hi kāraṇa-sākalye kārya-vaikalyaṃ yuktam / tasya
T11dhkpvsvu:5850: 15619 yadi mantrā vidhānād anyato vā kaṃcit svabhāva-atiśayam āsādayeyuḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:5854: tat kim ayam asamartho apekṣyata ity anapekṣāḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:5855: 15622 sadā kuryur na vā kadācid anatiśayāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:5856: 15623 sarvasya sādhanaṃ te syur bhāva-śaktir yad īdṛśī /
T11dhkpvsvu:5858: 15625 yadi bhāva-śaktayā eva mantrāḥ siddhi-pradā na te kaṃcit parihareyur
T11dhkpvsvu:5860: na hy anyaṃ prati svabhāvo atad-bhāvo
T11dhkpvsvu:5861: 15627 bhavati / tasya tena anapakarṣaṇād anyena ca anutkarṣaṇāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:5864: 15702 abhāvāt / ata eva asya asaṃskāryatvāt prayoktā api na asti / ataḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:5866: 15704 saṃskāryasya api bhāvasya vastu-bhedo hi bhedakaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:5867: 15705 prayoktṛ-bhedān niyamaḥ śaktau na samaye bhavet //295//
T11dhkpvsvu:5875: 15709 prāyam / tad ime mantrāḥ svabhāva-atiśayāt phaladāyinaḥ kāryā
T11dhkpvsvu:5876: 15710 api na śūdra-ādi-prayoge apy anyathā syuḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:5885: 15715 na tadvad anayoḥ kaṃcid api guṇaṃ viniyataṃ paśyāmaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:5889: 15717 bheda-anvayo loke pratīti-bhedaḥ so asaty api jāti-bhede vyāpāra-
T11dhkpvsvu:5891: 15719 tad ime aviśiṣṭena prayujyamānā mantrās tato aviśiṣṭam eva
T11dhkpvsvu:5893: tena aviśeṣeṇa eva phaladāḥ syuḥ / yadā
T11dhkpvsvu:5894: 15721 tu samayād ebhyaḥ phalaṃ tadā ayam adoṣaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:5901: yad api prayoktā phalam aśnuta iti
T11dhkpvsvu:5906: 15728 yena tataḥ kaścit phalam aśnute anyo na /
T11dhkpvsvu:5907: 15729 prayogo yady abhivyaktiḥ sā prāg eva nirākṛtā //296//
T11dhkpvsvu:5908: 15801 na hi nityānāṃ kācid abhivyaktir ity uktam yato abhivyañjakaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:5910: 15803 vyaktiś ca buddhiḥ sā yasmāt sa phalair yadi yujyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:5911: 15804 syāc śrotaḥ phala-sambandho vaktā hi vyakti-kāraṇam //297//
T11dhkpvsvu:5912: 15806 na hi śabdasya anyataḥ svarūpa-pariṇāmo vyaktir na apy āvaraṇa-vigamanam /
T11dhkpvsvu:5913: 15807 kiṃ tu tad-viṣayā pratītir aśrūyamāṇe avyakta-vyapadeśāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:5914: 15808 tatra yadi buddhi-hetur vaktā syāt tat tulyaṃ śrotary api iti
T11dhkpvsvu:5919: 15811 na vaktur iti viśeṣa iti cet /
T11dhkpvsvu:5928: tac ca na śakyam tasya kathaṃcid
T11dhkpvsvu:5931: 15816 śrāvayaty ahaṃ śrāvayāmi iti tayoḥ pratyayād vaktṛ-śrotṛ-bheda
T11dhkpvsvu:5932: 15817 iti cet / anupakārya-upakārakād bhrānti-mātrāt tad-bhāve atiprasaṅgāt /
T11dhkpvsvu:5937: 15820 prasaṅgāt / bhrāntir api kutaścid upakāre sati kayācit pratyāsattyā
T11dhkpvsvu:5939: sa apy atyanta-anupakāre na syāt / tasmād
T11dhkpvsvu:5943: 15825 manojapo vā vyarthaḥ syāc śabdo hi śrotra-gocaraḥ //298//
T11dhkpvsvu:5947: na brūmaḥ śabda eva iti / śabdas tv
T11dhkpvsvu:5948: 15828 avaśyaṃ tal-lakṣaṇas tasya lakṣaṇa-antara-abhāvāt / tatra yadi
T11dhkpvsvu:5950: 15901 śruti-viṣayāṇāṃ karaṇānāṃ prayoktā jāpī na mantra-phalena
T11dhkpvsvu:5952: na hi tadā śrotreṇa kaṃcid arthaṃ
T11dhkpvsvu:5955: 15904 pāraṃparyeṇa tajjatvāt tad-vyaktiḥ sā api cen matiḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:5956: 15905 na hi manasā dhyāyato api mantra-ābhāsā buddhiḥ śabda-śravaṇād
T11dhkpvsvu:5957: 15906 ṛte / tataḥ śabda-prabhavāt sā api śabda-vyaktir eva /
T11dhkpvsvu:5959: 15907 syāt / śabda-artha-vikalpānām api paraṃparayā prasūtir asti iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:5962: 15910 tathā syus tad-arthā ced asiddhaṃ kalpanā-anvayāt //299//
T11dhkpvsvu:5963: 15911 na brūmaḥ sarvā śabda-prabhavā buddhis tad-vyaktir iti / yā tu
T11dhkpvsvu:5966: 15913 asiddham / na hi svalakṣaṇe vikalpānāṃ vṛttir iti nivedayiṣyāmaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:5967: 15914 te hi yathāsvam āntarād vikalpa-vāsanā-prabodhād anapekṣita-
T11dhkpvsvu:5970: 15916 na hi yo yasya sattā-upadhānaṃ na apekṣate sa tasya hetuḥ / ahetuś
T11dhkpvsvu:5976: atra apy uktaṃ śrotary api prasaṅga
T11dhkpvsvu:5977: 15920 iti / taj-jñāne ca prayoge śabdaḥ puruṣe vyāpriyate /
T11dhkpvsvu:5981: 15922 puruṣaḥ śabdānāṃ prayoktā ity alaukiko ayaṃ vyavahāraḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:5988: 15929 samayam ārocayet yathā-samayaṃ ca arthaṃ niṣpādayed iti
T11dhkpvsvu:5992: yad uktaṃ na varṇebhyo anyā kācid
T11dhkpvsvu:5994: 16004 ānupūrvyām asatyāṃ syāt saro rasa iti śrutau /
T11dhkpvsvu:5996: 16006 na hi saro rasa ity ādi-pādeṣu kaścid varṇa-bhedo na ca varṇa-vyatiriktam
T11dhkpvsvu:5999: 16008 pratibhāṃ paśyāmaḥ ānupūrvīm eva ca atulyām /
T11dhkpvsvu:6002: tasmād asti sā bhedavatī yato ayam
T11dhkpvsvu:6009: 16016 apekṣya tat-smṛtiṃ paścād ādhatte smṛtim ātmani //303//
T11dhkpvsvu:6026: 16107 anyad eva tato rūpaṃ tad varṇānāṃ padaṃ padam /
T11dhkpvsvu:6028: 16109 tasmān na khalv eka eva padeṣu varṇānāṃ svabhāvaḥ kartṛ-citta-
T11dhkpvsvu:6032: 16112 sā ca ānupūrvī varṇānāṃ pravṛttā racana-ākṛtaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:6035: 16115 ity uktam / sā ca puruṣa-vitarka-vicāra-kṛtā iti na sthita-kramā
T11dhkpvsvu:6039: 16118 ādīnāṃ bīja-aṅkura-ādīnāṃ ca sva-icchayā krama-racanā śakyate
T11dhkpvsvu:6040: 16119 kartum / tata eva puruṣa-dharma-saṃkhyāte vikalpa-anukrame sati
T11dhkpvsvu:6044: 16123 sati indhane dāha-vṛtter asaty abhāvād adṛṣṭa-indhano api dahano
T11dhkpvsvu:6048: 16201 api varṇa-anukramaḥ puruṣa-vikalpaṃ yadi na apekṣeta nirālambanaḥ
T11dhkpvsvu:6055: 16204 atad-viśiṣṭasya ca atat-kṛtau sarvatra kāryakāraṇabhāvaś ca
T11dhkpvsvu:6060: sarve api ghaṭa-ādayo bhāvāḥ kṛtrimā akṛtrimā
T11dhkpvsvu:6064: 16208 ca / tān api hi para-kriyā-darśana-pūrvakam eva anyaḥ karoty avidita
T11dhkpvsvu:6065: 16209 kartāraś ca kecid iti sarveṣāṃ keṣāṃcid vā akriyā-abhiniveśo astu /
T11dhkpvsvu:6066: 16210 tasmāt sarvā eva iyaṃ varṇa-ānupūrvī prasiddha-kāryakāraṇabhāva-
T11dhkpvsvu:6070: 16214 ayaṃ kramo varṇānāṃ viṣa-nirghāta-ādi-samartho na anya iti yady
T11dhkpvsvu:6071: 16215 anyo api jānīyat taṃ tathā eva pratipadyeta /
T11dhkpvsvu:6073: 16216 ayam anukramaḥ svabhāvato api kārya-kṛt kaiścid eva vijñāta ity
T11dhkpvsvu:6076: 16218 na ayam iti śakyam unnetum asaṃkīrṇasya liṅga-viśeṣasya asiddheḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:6078: 16220 upadeśe api kathaṃcit svabhāva-viveka-apratīter anyatra kārya-
T11dhkpvsvu:6079: 16221 saṃvādāt tasya ca karaṇāt prāg draṣṭum aśakyatvāt / na
T11dhkpvsvu:6080: 16222 ca ayam anukramaḥ svabhāvataḥ kārakaḥ kasyacid āśu-siddher
T11dhkpvsvu:6089: 16227 tu sva-icchā-pravṛttiḥ sattva-sabhāgatā-ādi-vaśāt sā iva aviśeṣād vā
T11dhkpvsvu:6090: 16301 kaṃcid anugṛhṇāti na aparam iti yuktam /
T11dhkpvsvu:6099: 16306 dharma-svabhāva iti ca yathāvasaraṃ nivedayiṣyāmaḥ / maitrī-
T11dhkpvsvu:6100: 16307 śauca-dharma-parāyaṇānāṃ ca tan-nimittam eva kasyāścid siddher
T11dhkpvsvu:6103: 16309 sa tad-virodhī dharmo yukto adharmaś ca /
T11dhkpvsvu:6107: 16311 tad iṣṭaṃ phalaṃ vrata-āder vipāko api tu pūrvasya karmaṇaḥ /
T11dhkpvsvu:6111: 16314 prayogas tasya iṣṭa-phalasya karmaṇaḥ kathaṃcid upakārāt pācakaś
T11dhkpvsvu:6114: 16316 dharmā sa dharmas tena kṛtaḥ sa tathā tad-ārādhanena phalati iti /
T11dhkpvsvu:6116: 16318 vinā api puruṣeṇa tad-upakārāt phalam iti cet / na /
T11dhkpvsvu:6125: 16323 ye api tantravidaḥ kecin mantrān kāṃścana kurvate /
T11dhkpvsvu:6127: 16325 rathyā-puruṣā api kecana tantrajñāḥ svayaṃ-kṛtair mantraiḥ
